Directions

Here's a map with various locations marked (thanks to Lawrence Cavedon and Nicola Stokes).

There's also the Zoo's directions and the annotated Zoo's map.

  • Tutorials will be held in Theatre 3, Level 2, ICT building, 111 Barry Street (just off Grattan St), Carlton.
  • Workshop Monday sessions will be held in the Bong Su room (in the Elephant Centre on the Zoo map).
  • Workshop Tuesday sessions will be held in the Rainforest room (in the Lakeside Bistro area on the Zoo map).

Enquiries

The Australasian Language Technology Workshop is being organised by ALTA, the Australasian Language Technology Association.

For any comments or questions about the workshop please contact the organizers (workshop AT alta DOT asn DOT au).
